about_the_game:
The Last Child is an atmospheric side-scrolling game that gives you the opportunity to accept your past and continue living in the present.
In it you will go through a number of locations, each of which is imbued with its own history and atmosphere, has its own mechanics and secrets. There are no right or wrong decisions, there is only the fate of the character and your choice.

START YOUR ADVENTURE HERE

Along the way, you will experience a sense of danger and good luck, see mysterious creatures, touch magic with your own hands and much more.

  • Travel through a fairy-tale world.
  • Discover new lands.
  • Get secret achievements.
  • Solve interesting puzzles.
And don't forget, you are the last child.

LEARN THE WHOLE HISTORY STEP BY STEP

Ancient scriptures say: “In a universe filled with the forces of light and darkness, there lived a girl named Aliye. She gained both powers, but despite her desire to keep only the light, the darkness will continue to absorb the light, and after that Aliye...” Find a way out of this situation and find out what the reason was.

THE BEGINNING AND THE END IS UNCHANGEABLE, BUT THE PATH IS DIFFERENT OR NOT?

Select the answer options and decide what you need to do to continue on your desired path. Show your fearlessness or prudence in various situations to learn more about this world.

name: The Last Child
short_description: Discover the stunning world of The Last Child. In it you will enjoy the beauty of the world, its deepest darkness and its brightest light. A side view will allow you to concentrate on the world and its characters. Your adventure, your decision can change it.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
